name: Snake 4D
description:
[Keyboard Controls]
Left D-Pad: W A S D
Right D-Pad: I J K L
Pause: P

Snake 4D is the classic snake game we all know and love reimagined as a four dimensional minimalistic action arcade game.

Challenge your mind and reaction times as you reach higher levels and higher scores!

You may be wondering, what exactly is Snake in 4D? 

Classic snake is played in 2D, where you can move in two directions on a 2D plane.

For 3D, you can move in three directions in a 3D space. Think of it as playing in multiple 2D planes, with the third direction helping you move through the 2D planes.

For 4D, you can move in four directions in a 4D space. Think of it as playing in multiple 3D spaces, with the fourth direction helping you move through the 3D spaces.

This game is inspired by the work of Pella86  at https://github.com/Pella86/Snake4d

Have fun!

- GJ Tiquia
